trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lake Oswego
There were no other sightings in Lake Oswego on or around September 13th 1998
Summary: like a disk with a cylinder at the top and at the top it was rounded at the cylinder it had ultra white windows
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my moms bed looking outside the window it was late at night. I saw this big object coming into my view like it was just passing by. As soon as i saw it i thought it was a UFO. The object was like a disc with a very wide cylinder type of shape but not as wide as the base and at the top of the cylinder it was rounded. And in the cylinder part it sort of had window but each window was ultra white. I ran to my mom told her to come when we went to her room and it was gone.
